The story involves five high school students, Taichi, Iori, Himeko, Yoshifumi and Yui,
who are all members of the Cultural Research Club. One day, they begin experiencing a phenomenon
in which they randomly swap bodies amongst themselves. As these five friends face many different
phenomena at the whims of a mysterious being known as Heartseed, their friendship is put to the ultimate test.
